example.parse: (S (S (LST (NOUN_NUM 3) (PUNC -)) (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ندين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC محاولة) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاعتداء)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP المطران) (NOUN_PROP غريغوار) (NOUN_PROP حداد))))))) (PUNC .)

arg.g: the attempt to harm Bishop Gregoire Haddad
